name: Dumplings calf with piglet
description: Real self-made dumplings made from fluffy dough on rustic yolks and sour cream

name: Pilaf
description: Pilaf on charcoal from regular rice with lamb, spices and vegetables on fat tail

name: Spit Chicken
description: Served on pita bread with fresh tomato and cucumber, marinated onions and kebab sauce

name: Soup Ripped chicken
description: Chicken carcass, carrots, pasta, herbs, egg, salt, spices.

name: Pig Chop
description: A thick piece of fried pork with tomatoes and mushrooms under a cheese crust

name: Calf in a creamy sauce
description: Calf with champignons and onions fried in a creamy sour cream sauce with mashed potatoes and pickles.

name: Baked pike perch
description: Pike perch fillet with potatoes, village sour cream, herbs and onions

name: Pike ear on crucian carp
description: Rich marching fish soup with four fish, lavrukh, pepper and onion with vodka.
